DOC.detailed_description: This single center 4-arm randomize pilot study ass rate completion Fecal Immunochemical Test ( FIT ) increase addition financial incentive . Potentially eligible subject identify via data abstraction Penn Data Store . We conduct Electronic Medical Record ( EMR ) review randomly select patient data abstraction use PennChart confirm eligibility 1,080 patient identify . We randomize 1,080 patient one four arm intervention phase . - Arm 1 : mail FIT kit ( usual care ) - Arm 2 : mail FIT kit + gift card include mailing ( unconditional fix incentive ) - Arm 3 : mail FIT kit + guarantee receive gift card kit return within two month ( conditional fix incentive ) - Arm 4 : mail FIT kit + entry 1/10 chance lottery receive gift card kit return within two month ( conditional lottery incentive ) All 1,080 subject receive mail FIT kit . Subjects whose FIT result record PennChart receive follow-up phone call via Interactive Voice Response ( IVR ) three week kit mail subject . Subjects whose FIT result record PennChart receive follow-up mailed reminder six week kit mail subject . Subjects receive follow-up regardless arm randomize .
